location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from slight pest damage, which has slightly obscured some of the address of the letter. However, it can still be clearly read.

mods.abstract: The letter is a reply to a communication dated 19 October 1807. The reply is brief and concerns unspecified instructions issued by the Government of Bombay, which the Resident has not carried out.
